headline.main: DISMISSAL DENIED IN ESPIONAGE TRIAL; Judge Rejects Motion of Counsel for Fifteen Accused

lead_paragraph: Judge Mortimer W. Byers denied yesterday motions of defense counsel to dismiss an indictment against all fifteen defendants accused of espionage and failure to register as agents of a foreign government as the espionage trial in Brooklyn entered its seventh week.
abstract: dismissal pleas for 15 denied; Schroetter pleads guilty to espionage
